summary: Adds a standalone axe to the game in the shape of a hook
descriptionHtml:
Executioner\'s Hook

This is my first model, tell me what you think! 
_________________________________

Details:

Fully craftable.
Found under iron section.
Costs 1x firewood, 4x iron ingots, 1x ebony ingot
Tempered with 1x ebony ingot. 

Damge: 30
Value: 200
Weight: 20
Enchantment: none
_________________________________

Credits:
DeMoNhUnTeR1986 for lots of help and make the .nif files.
backstept for helping with with UV mapping.
_________________________________

Version history:
2.0 Fixed crafting issues. Everything should work now
1.0 Initial release
_________________________________

Permissions:
Ask before use. Dont upload anywhere else. It may be translated into other languages.
author: Luddemann
